[GPG - SUCCESS] GPG Key Setup Verification

## Description
This PR verifies that my GPG key has been correctly set up and can sign commits.

## GPG Key Information
- **Key ID**: `{{ KEY_ID }}` (last 8 characters)
- **Key Fingerprint**: `{{ KEY_FINGERPRINT }}`
- **Key Owner**: {{ KEY_OWNER }}

## Verification Steps Completed
- [ ] Forked the repository
- [ ] Cloned the forked repository locally
- [ ] Configured Git with my GPG key
- [ ] Created a test commit with GPG signing
- [ ] Pushed the signed commit to my fork
- [ ] Verified the commit shows as "Verified" on GitHub
